MODAL.LOGIN_SIGNUP_TITLE: To get your promocode, please log in or create a MoneyOwl account.

FINANCES_MODAL.TITLE: Step 2
FINANCES_MODAL.CONTENT_DESC: This is the amount you can set aside for protection needs and investing towards education and retirement goals
FINANCES_MODAL.HOW_DO_WE_CALCULATE_DESC1: We take the Cash you own minus a Emergency Cash pool of 6 months of expenses and loan payments
FINANCES_MODAL.HOW_DO_WE_CALCULATE_DESC2: Emergency Cash is important in case you lose your job or incur unexpected expenses. Monthly Spare Cash is your take home income minus your expenses and loan repayments minus yor bad mood fund allocation
FINANCES_MODAL.EMERGENCY_BELOW_DESC:
Oh no, seems like your liquid cash is less than 6 months' of expenses.
Save before you invest.
FINANCES_MODAL.EMERGENCY_BELOW_NOTE_DESC: We will analyse your financial health more fully, assess your insurance needs and recommend how you can use your CPF for retirement

NO_DEPENDANTS.TITLE: Step 3
NO_DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_DESC: This is the estimated cost of ESTIMATED_COST life coverage for you, using:
NO_DEPENDANTS.SUB_TITLE_DESC: Each dollar whole life policy premium goes to:
NO_DEPENDANTS.SUB_TITLE_NOTE: Actual split depends on companies and age of insured
NO_DEPENDANTS.SUB_CONTENT_DESC1: You will never fully cover yourself with expensive whole life policies. With whole life, you are mainly paying for a low-return investment.
NO_DEPENDANTS.SUB_CONTENT_DESC2: Term insurance is fit-for-purpose for most of us. We only need coverage when we still have dependants or when our earned income is needed

DEPENDANTS.TITLE: Step 3
DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_DESC: Some types of medical insurance are needed for limited years and some are needed for life, for example:
DEPENDANTS.SUB_CONTENT_TITLE_DESC_1: Until retirement age or when we have no more dependants

RETIREMENT_MODAL.TITLE: Step 4
RETIREMENT_MODAL.SUB_CONTENT_DESC_21: 1. Safe retirement income floor to meet basic expenses & care expenses in event of disability.
RETIREMENT_MODAL.SUB_CONTENT_TITLE_3: Medical Expenses Insurance to Pay Hospital Bills
RETIREMENT_MODAL.SUB_CONTENT_TITLE_3_DESC: (e.g. Medishield Life, Private Integrated Shield Plans)

NO_DEPENDANTS.TITLE: Step 1
NO_DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_DESC: This is how much things may cost in 10 years’ time.
NO_DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_NOTE: That’s why you must save and grow your assets and get proper insurance coverage. It’s great that you are planning now!

DEPENDANTS.TITLE: Step 1
DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_DESC: This is how much university may cost you in future.
DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_BODY_DESC: The amount includes 6% inflation for tuition fee per year and 3% inflation for general living expenses per year.
DEPENDANTS.CONTENT_NOTE: It’s great that you are planning now!

COMPREHENSIVE.GET_STARTED: A step-by-step guide to help you plan your finances!
COMPREHENSIVE.PHILOSOPHY_DESC: when planning for your future, we show you the 'good enough' concept of what children education and retirement could like.(pls edit text)
COMPREHENSIVE.PHOLOSOPHY_DESC_SUB: your money will be used to first fund children education and later support your retirement. Let's see how it turns out
COMPREHENSIVE.RESULT_SUB_TITLE: At the end of the session ,you will get:
COMPREHENSIVE.RESULTS_FIRST: Fun and interactive result that enables you to design your strategy to reach goals
COMPREHENSIVE.RESULTS_SECOND: You can also sign up for our advisory services to get additional help

COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_1_DESC: Your family commitments will impact on your financial Planning.Lets list it out now!
COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_2_DESC: The information help us to estimate what you can save and invest, your protection need and your financial health.
COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_3_DESC: Let's find out how protected you are in face unexpected events
COMPREHENSIVE_STEPS.STEP_4_DESC: Tell us when you wish to retire and we will examine how you could reach this goal during your advisory session

MY_PROFILE.NATIONALITY_ALERT: Seems like you have changed your nationality.Changes will be applied to all platforms upon saving.
MY_PROFILE.DOB_ALERT: Sorry, this tool is not suitable for people age 55 and above.For queries,You may wish to contact us at enquiries@moneyowl.com.sg.

DEPENDANT_SELECTION.TITLE: What's On Your Shoulders
DEPENDANT_SELECTION.DEPENDANTS_DESC: A dependant is child, parent, spouse, sibling and relative I need to provide for.

DEPENDANT_DETAILS.DESC: Tell us more about those you need to take care of and we will include their needs in your financial plan.

DEPENDANT_EDUCATION.ABOUT: Do you want to save up for your child's university education?
OPTIONS: No, but i need insurance payput to cover my child's education in case i pass away

ENDOWMENT_PLAN.ABOUT: Select which child has education endowment plan
ENDOWMENT_PLAN.DESCRIPTION: Do have any existing education endowment plan?
ENDOWMENT_PLAN.SKIP_ENDOWMENT_PLAN: Skip, I do not have any
ENDOWMENT_PLAN.TOOLTIP_MESSAGE: An Education endownment plan is typically an insurance policy that matures and pays out around the time of the child's entry into university

EDUCATION_PREFERENCE.HEADER: Tell us about the education Preferences.

MY_EARNINGS.ABOUT: Every month, you fill your bucket as you bring home an income!
MY_EARNINGS.ANNUAL_BONUS_DESC: Bonuses, dividends and other income you earn each year also fill up your bucket!
MY_EARNINGS.ADD_MONTHLY_INCOME_NOTE: You have added all types of annual income
MY_EARNINGS.ADD_DIVIDENDS_NOTE: You have added all types of annual income

TOOLTIP.MONTHLY_SALARY_MESSAGE: Your total monthly gross salary, including the portion that goes into your CPF.
TOOLTIP.ANNUAL_BONUS_MESSAGE: Annual bonuses include 13th month payments, performance bonuses and other additional payments you expect to receive from work outside of the regular monthly paycheck.
TOOLTIP.ADD_MONTHLY_INCOME_MESSAGE: Additional work that pays you a monthly income with CPF should be in Other Work Income.
TOOLTIP.ADD_DIVIDENDS_MESSAGE: Add up all the stock dividends you receive every year.

MY_SPENDINGS.ABOUT: When you spend, you draw from your income bucket.

TOOLTIP.OTHER_LOAN_MESSAGE: These are non-mortgage related loan repayments, such as renovation loans, car loans, credit lines, credit cards
TOOLTIP.LIVING_EXPENSES_MESSAGE: These are monthly personal expenses plus your share of household expenses, excluding mortgage and loan repayments.
TOOLTIP.MORTAGE_PAYMENT_MESSAGE: This is your share of the monthly mortgage payment for investment/ other properties.
TOOLTIP.HOME_LOAN_MESSAGE: This is your share of the monthly mortgage payment for the home you stay in.

GETTING_STARTED.TITLE: Get Started
GETTING_STARTED.DESC: Your financial report will be generated at the end of the journey! Ready to go?
GETTING_STARTED.TOOL_TIP_DESC: You can check your progress here!

DEPENDANT_EDUCATION_SELECTION.TITLE: Do you need to save up for any of your children's education ?
DEPENDANT_EDUCATION_SELECTION.YES_DESC: whose education you would like to fund?
DEPENDANT_EDUCATION_SELECTION.NO_LABEL: No, but i need an insurance payout to cover education expenses in case i pass away
DEPENDANT_EDUCATION_SELECTION.NO_DESC: Select which child you will like to cover for.

RSP.TITLE: Do you have any Regular Unit Trust Saving Plans(RSP)?

MY_ASSETS.TITLE: What You Own
MY_ASSETS.HEADER: You may have already strored up some buckets over time.some of these can grow and help fund your future goals.

MY_LIABILITIES.TITLE: What You Owe
MY_LIABILITIES.HEADER: Sometimes, we borrow to find our assets or spending. These Liabilities Have to be repaid over time

YOUR_FINANCES.HEADER: How You Spend When Down On Luck
YOUR_FINANCES.ABOUT: Sometimes life throws you a curve ball.
YOUR_FINANCES.TITLE: Bad Mood Fund
YOUR_FINANCES.DESC: Why not put little aside to each month to pamper yourself on rough days without guilt or worry,out of your monthly surplus?
YOUR_FINANCES.LABEL_DESC: Your monthly allocation to your Bad Mood Fund.
YOUR_FINANCES.HOSPITAL_CHOICE_DESC: If you are ill or injured, which hospital ward will you choose?
